pages.text: Ingredients are 'usually' processed food ready to used when making food, most of them will have a weight to them and their weights can be combined in the crafting table or in a $(l:using_tools/cooler_box)Cooler Box$() to do it in automated way. $(br2)If ingredients don't combine it might be because it goes over the max amount.
Most ingredients have an affect attached to them or an effect modifier that will modify/amplify effects from other ingredients.
